synopsis.text: Ryo Sakazaki is a martial arts instructor struggling to make ends meet. While searching for a lost cat to claim a reward, Ryo and his friend Robert Garcia accidentally witness a mob hit in an apartment. The ruthless crime boss Mr. Big believes they stole a valuable diamond called the 'Eye of Sirius' during the incident. Since then, Ryo and Robert have been targeted by Mr. Big's men. After surviving attempts on their lives, they learn that Mr. Big has kidnapped Ryo's sister Yuri and is holding her hostage for the diamond. With nowhere left to turn, Ryo and Robert have no choice but to fight through Mr. Big's criminal empire if they want to rescue Yuri and clear their names. Outgunned and outnumbered, they rely on their martial arts skills as they battle past Mr. Big's army of mob enforcers and his deadly assistant, King. It's a race against time to save Yuri and take down Mr. Big once and for all.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
